pages.title: Redimensionneur d'image
pages.metaTitle: Gratuit Image Resizer - Resize Images En ligne Instantly | MyImageUpscaler
pages.metaDescription: Resize images online for free. No upload required - all processing happens in your browser. Supports JPEG, PNG, WebP. Perfect for social media, web, and print.
pages.h1: Gratuit En ligne Image Resizer - Resize Images Instantly
pages.intro: Resize your Images to any dimension in seconds. Our Gratuit En ligne Image resizer works entirely in your browser - no Télécharger, no signup, no watermarks. Perfect for Réseaux sociaux, websites, and Impression.
pages.description: Outil professionnel de redimensionnement d'image qui fonctionne directement dans votre navigateur. Redimensionnez les images à des dimensions exactes, choisissez parmi les préréglages des réseaux sociaux ou conservez automatiquement le rapport d'aspect. Aucune perte de qualité avec notre technologie avancée de canvas.

features.title: Redimensionnement instantané dans le navigateur
features.description: Tout le traitement se produit localement dans votre navigateur. Vos images ne quittent jamais votre appareil, garantissant une confidentialité totale et des résultats instantanés.

features.title: Réseaux sociaux Presets
features.description: Redimensionnez en un clic aux dimensions parfaites pour Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn et YouTube. Plus besoin de deviner les tailles.

features.title: Dimensions personnalisées
features.description: Entrez des dimensions en pixels exactes ou laissez notre calculateur intelligent de rapport d'aspect maintenir des proportions parfaites automatiquement.

features.title: Plusieurs Output Formats
features.description: Exportez en JPEG, PNG ou WebP avec des paramètres de qualité ajustables. Parfait pour l'optimisation web ou les téléchargements haute qualité.

features.title: Flux de prêt pour le lot
features.description: Sauvegardez vos paramètres préréglés et redimensionnez rapidement plusieurs images avec des résultats cohérents à chaque fois.

features.title: Aucun filigrane, jamais
features.description: Entièrement gratuit sans filigrane, sans inscription ni frais cachés. Des résultats professionnels disponibles pour tous.

useCases.example: Redimensionnez les portraits en 400x400 pour LinkedIn ou Discord

useCases.title: Pièces jointes email
useCases.description: Réduisez les images volumineuses à des sizes compatibles avec email sans sacrifier trop de qualité.

benefits.title: 100% privé et sécurisé
benefits.description: Les images ne quittent jamais votre navigateur. Aucun téléchargement sur des serveurs signifie que vos photos restent complètement privées.

benefits.title: Lightning Rapide
benefits.description: Instant processing with no waiting in queues or upload delays. Resize hundreds of images in minutes.

benefits.title: Perfect Qualité Control
benefits.description: Ajustez les paramètres de qualité de 1 à 100 % pour trouver l'équilibre parfait entre la taille du fichier et la fidélité visuelle.

howItWorks.title: Téléchargez votre image
howItWorks.description: Glissez-déposez votre image ou cliquez pour parcourir. Prend en charge JPEG, PNG et WebP jusqu'à 25 Mo. Le traitement reste dans votre navigateur.

howItWorks.title: Choose Dimensions
howItWorks.description: Select a social media preset or enter custom width and height. Toggle aspect ratio lock to maintain proportions.

howItWorks.title: Ajuster les paramètres
howItWorks.description: Choisissez votre format de sortie (JPEG, PNG, WebP) et ajustez le curseur de qualité. Prévisualisez les nouvelles dimensions avant le traitement.

howItWorks.title: Téléchargez l'image redimensionnée
howItWorks.description: Click 'Process Image' and instantly download your resized photo. No watermarks, no signup required.

faq.question: Is this Image resizer really Gratuit?
faq.answer: Yes! Our image resizer is 100% free with no hidden fees, watermarks, or account requirements. You can resize unlimited images.

faq.question: Are my Images uploaded to your servers?
faq.answer: No! All Image Traitement happens directly in your browser using Canvas API technology. Your Images never leave your device, ensuring Complet privacy.

faq.question: Quelle est la taille maximale de fichier que je peux redimensionner ?
faq.answer: Vous pouvez redimensionner des images jusqu'à 25 Mo. Cette limite est basée sur la mémoire du navigateur, et non sur nos serveurs (puisque nous n'utilisons pas de serveurs pour le traitement).

faq.question: Can I resize Images for Instagram?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We have presets for Instagram Posts (1080x1080), Instagram Stories (1080x1920), and all major Réseaux sociaux platforms.

faq.question: Will resizing reduce Image Qualité?
faq.answer: When you downsize Images (make them smaller), Qualité remains excellent. Upsizing can introduce softness - for IA-powered upscaling with Qualité Amélioration, try our IA Image Agrandisseur.

faq.question: Quels formats puis-je exporter ?
faq.answer: You can export as JPEG (best for photos), PNG (best for graphics with transparency), or WebP (best for web optimization).

faq.question: How do I maintain aspect ratio when resizing?
faq.answer: Enable the 'Maintain aspect ratio' toggle. When active, changing width automatically adjusts height proportionally (and vice versa).

faq.question: Can I Lot resize Plusieurs Images?
faq.answer: Currently, you can resize one Image at a time. For Lot Traitement and advanced IA Amélioration, check out our premium IA Image Agrandisseur.

faq.question: Quelle taille doivent avoir les publications Instagram ?
faq.answer: Instagram posts are Meilleur at 1080x1080 pixels (square), 1080x1350 (portrait), or 1080x566 (landscape). Square posts at 1080x1080 get the most consistent display.

faq.question: Quelle taille ont les Stories Instagram ?
faq.answer: Les Stories Instagram doivent faire 1080x1920 pixels (rapport d'aspect 9:16) pour remplir tout l'écran sans rognage.

faq.question: Will resizing reduce my Image Qualité?
faq.answer: Our Outil uses high-Qualité algorithms to minimize Qualité loss. For Meilleur results, start with Images larger than your target size.

faq.question: Puis-je redimensionner pour les Instagram Reels ?
faq.answer: Oui ! Les Instagram Reels utilisent les mêmes dimensions 1080x1920 (9:16) que les Stories.

faq.question: What size should YouTube thumbnails be?
faq.answer: YouTube recommande 1280x720 pixels avec un rapport d'aspect 16:9. La largeur minimale est de 640 pixels et le fichier doit faire moins de 2 Mo.

faq.question: What Format is Meilleur for YouTube thumbnails?
faq.answer: YouTube accepte JPG, GIF et PNG. JPEG est recommandé pour les photos car il offre une bonne qualité avec des tailles de fichier plus petites.

faq.question: Pourquoi 1280x720 est la taille recommandée ?
faq.answer: 1280x720 is the minimum Résolution that displays well across all devices while matching YouTube's 16:9 player aspect ratio.

faq.question: Will my thumbnail look good on all devices?
faq.answer: Yes! 1280x720 thumbnails scale perfectly to all screen sizes, from mobile phones to 4K TVs.

faq.question: Quelle taille doivent avoir les publications Facebook ?
faq.answer: Facebook recommends 1200x630 pixels for shared Images and link previews. This size displays well in the news feed across all devices.

faq.question: What size is a Facebook cover Photo?
faq.answer: Facebook cover Photos should be 820x312 pixels for pages, or 851x315 for personal profiles. Mobile displays may crop slightly differently.

faq.question: What's the Meilleur Format for Facebook Images?
faq.answer: JPEG is best for photos, PNG for graphics with text or transparency. Facebook compresses images, so start with high quality.

faq.question: Why do my Images look blurry on Facebook?
faq.answer: Facebook compresses uploaded Images. Use our Outil to resize to exact dimensions and export at high Qualité to minimize Compression artifacts.

faq.question: What size should Twitter Images be?
faq.answer: Twitter recommends 1200x675 pixels (16:9 ratio) for single Images in tweets. This size displays without cropping on most devices.

faq.question: Quelle est la taille d'une en-tête Twitter ?
faq.answer: Les en-têtes Twitter doivent faire 1500x500 pixels. Notez que certaines parties de l'en-tête peuvent être couvertes par votre photo de profil.

faq.question: Does Twitter compress Images?
faq.answer: Oui, Twitter compresse les images. Utilisez des exportations haute qualité (90%+) et des dimensions exactes pour minimiser les artefacts de compression.

faq.question: What's the maximum Image size on Twitter?
faq.answer: Twitter permet des images jusqu'à 5 Mo pour les photos. Les GIF peuvent faire jusqu'à 15 Mo. Notre outil vous aide à respecter ces limites.

faq.question: Quelle taille doivent avoir les publications LinkedIn ?
faq.answer: LinkedIn recommande 1200x627 pixels pour les publications du fil. Les bannières de profil doivent faire 1584x396 pixels.

faq.question: Quelle est la taille d'une bannière LinkedIn ?
faq.answer: Les bannières de profil LinkedIn doivent faire 1584x396 pixels. Les bannières de page entreprise ont la même taille.

faq.question: What Format is Meilleur for LinkedIn?
faq.answer: PNG ou JPEG fonctionnent bien tous les deux. Utilisez PNG pour les graphismes avec texte, JPEG pour les photographies. LinkedIn accepte les fichiers jusqu'à 8 Mo.

faq.question: Why do my LinkedIn Images look blurry?
faq.answer: LinkedIn compresses images. Start with high-quality images at exact dimensions and export at 90%+ quality to minimize compression.

howItWorks.description: Select JPEG, PNG, or WebP and adjust quality. Preview dimensions before processing.

howItWorks.title: Process & Télécharger
howItWorks.description: Click 'Process All' and download all resized images as a single ZIP file.

faq.question: How many Images can I resize at once?
faq.answer: You can process up to 20 Images in a single Lot. This limit ensures optimal browser performance while still providing significant time savings.

faq.question: Is the Lot Image resizer really Gratuit?
faq.answer: Yes! Our bulk image resizer is 100% free with unlimited batches. No watermarks, no signup required, no hidden fees.

faq.question: Are my Images uploaded to your servers?
faq.answer: No! All Image Traitement happens directly in your browser using the Canvas API. Your Images never leave your device, ensuring Complet privacy.

faq.question: What's the difference between 'fit' and 'fill' modes?
faq.answer: Fit mode resizes Images to fit within your dimensions while preserving aspect ratio (Images may be smaller than target). Fill mode crops Images to fill exact dimensions, which may remove some content from the edges.

faq.question: Will all my Images look the same size?
faq.answer: When 'Maintain aspect ratio' is enabled with 'fit' mode, Images will be proportional but may have different final dimensions. For exact uniform sizing, use 'fill' mode or uncheck aspect ratio.

faq.question: Can I Télécharger Images individually?
faq.answer: Yes! After Traitement, you can Télécharger each Image individually or Télécharger all at once as a ZIP file for convenience.

faq.question: What formats can I convert to?
faq.answer: You can output resized images as JPEG (best for photos), PNG (best for graphics), or WebP (best for web optimization).

faq.question: Can I remove an Image from the Lot?
faq.answer: Yes! You can remove individual Images from the Lot before or after Traitement by clicking the X button next to each Image.

howItWorks.title: Téléchargez votre image
howItWorks.description: Drag and drop or click to select images. Supports JPEG, PNG, WebP up to 25MB. Processing stays local.

howItWorks.title: Adjust Compression Level
howItWorks.description: Use the quality slider to balance file size vs visual quality. See real-time file size estimates.

howItWorks.title: Set Optional Dimensions
howItWorks.description: Optionally set maximum width/height to resize while compressing. Maintains aspect ratio automatically.

howItWorks.title: Téléchargez l'image compressée
howItWorks.description: Click compress and download your optimized image. See exact compression ratio and file sizes.

faq.question: How much can I compress an Image?
faq.answer: Typically, you can reduce file sizes by 60-80% without noticeable quality loss. Results vary based on the image content and your quality settings. Photos compress better than graphics with lots of detail.

faq.question: Will Compression reduce Image Qualité?
faq.answer: Compression involves a trade-off between file size and quality. At 70-80% quality settings, most people cannot see the difference. Our tool lets you preview and adjust the quality level before downloading.

faq.question: What's the Meilleur Format for Compression?
faq.answer: WebP offers the best compression with great quality, but isn't universally supported. JPEG is best for photos and has excellent browser support. PNG is lossless but creates larger files.

faq.question: Is there a file size limit?
faq.answer: You can compress images up to 25MB. This limit is based on browser memory, not server restrictions (since we don't upload to servers).

faq.question: Can I Lot compress Plusieurs Images?
faq.answer: Currently, you can compress one Image at a time. For Lot Traitement and advanced Fonctionnalités, check out our premium IA Image Agrandisseur which includes Compression.

faq.question: What Qualité setting should I use?
faq.answer: For web use, 70-80% is optimal. For printing or professional use, 85-95%. For maximum compression (like email), 60-70% works well.

howItWorks.description: Select or drag your PNG file. Supports transparent PNGs and all PNG variations.

howItWorks.title: Choose Background Color
howItWorks.description: If your PNG has transparency, select a background color (white, black, or custom). JPG doesn't support transparency.

howItWorks.title: Adjust Qualité
howItWorks.description: Set JPG quality level (80-90% recommended). Higher quality = larger files but better visuals.

howItWorks.title: Télécharger JPG
howItWorks.description: Convert and download your JPG file. See file size comparison before downloading.

faq.question: Why convert PNG to JPG?
faq.answer: JPG files are much smaller than PNG for photos and complex images. PNG is best for graphics with transparency or text, while JPG is better for photographs, reducing file sizes by 70-90%.

faq.question: What happens to transparent backgrounds?
faq.answer: JPG doesn't support transparency. Our Outil lets you choose a background color (white, black, or custom) to fill transparent areas. This gives you full control over the final appearance.

faq.question: Will I lose quality converting PNG to JPG?
faq.answer: PNG is lossless, while JPG uses compression. At 85-95% quality settings, quality loss is minimal and usually imperceptible. The file size savings are worth the tiny quality trade-off for most uses.

faq.question: Can I convert JPG back to PNG?
faq.answer: Yes! Our format converter also handles JPG to PNG conversion. However, converting JPG to PNG won't recover transparency or improve quality - it just changes the format.

faq.question: What Qualité setting should I use?
faq.answer: For web and social media, 80-85% is perfect. For printing or professional use, 90-95%. For maximum file size reduction, 70-75% still looks good.

faq.question: Why convert JPG to PNG?
faq.answer: PNG offers lossless quality and transparency support. It's ideal for graphics, logos, images that need editing, or when you need to preserve exact image quality without additional compression.

faq.question: Will converting improve my JPG Qualité?
faq.answer: Converting won't improve existing JPEG compression artifacts, but it will prevent any additional quality loss. The image will look the same but in a lossless format.

faq.question: Will the file size increase?
faq.answer: Yes, PNG files are typically larger than JPG because PNG is lossless. Expect 2-5x larger files for photographs. This is the trade-off for lossless quality.

faq.question: Can I add transparency after converting?
faq.answer: Yes! Once in PNG format, you can use image editing software to remove backgrounds and add transparency. JPG doesn't support transparency.

faq.question: Why convert WebP to JPG?
faq.answer: WebP is a modern format not supported everywhere. JPG works on all devices, in all email clients, and with all software - it's the universal standard.

faq.question: What happens to WebP transparency?
faq.answer: JPG doesn't support transparency. Our Outil lets you choose a background color (white, black, or custom) to fill transparent areas.

faq.question: Will file size increase?
faq.answer: Usually, yes. WebP typically offers better compression than JPG. Expect files to be 20-50% larger, but with guaranteed compatibility.

faq.question: Can I convert animated WebP?
faq.answer: Converting animated WebP will capture the first frame as a static JPG. For animated images, consider GIF format instead.

faq.question: Why convert WebP to PNG?
faq.answer: PNG offers better software compatibility than WebP while preserving transparency. It's ideal for editing, older software, or when you need a lossless format.

faq.question: Will transparency be preserved?
faq.answer: Yes! PNG fully supports transparency. Any transparent areas in your WebP will be preserved in the PNG output.

faq.question: Will file size increase?
faq.answer: Usually, yes. PNG files are typically larger than WebP since PNG doesn't compress as efficiently. This is the trade-off for wider compatibility.

faq.question: Which is better: PNG or JPG from WebP?
faq.answer: Use PNG if you need transparency or lossless quality for editing. Use JPG for smaller files and universal compatibility when transparency isn't needed.

faq.question: Why convert JPG to WebP?
faq.answer: WebP offers 25-35% smaller files than JPG at the same visual quality. This means faster website loading, lower bandwidth costs, and better user experience.

faq.question: Is WebP supported everywhere?
faq.answer: WebP is supported by all modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) covering over 95% of users. For older browsers, consider serving JPG as a fallback.

faq.question: How much smaller will my files be?
faq.answer: Typically, WebP files are 25-35% smaller than equivalent JPG files. A 1MB JPG might become 650-750KB as WebP with identical visual quality.

faq.question: Should I use WebP for all my images?
faq.answer: For web use, yes! WebP is ideal for websites. For email, printing, or older software, JPG may be more compatible.

useCases.title: Email Attachments
useCases.description: Send multiple photos via email without hitting attachment size limits.
useCases.example: Compress a photo album from 20MB to 4MB for email

useCases.title: Cloud Storage Savings
useCases.description: Compress photo backups before uploading to cloud storage to save space and costs.
useCases.example: Compress 500 vacation Photos from 10GB to 2GB before backup

benefits.title: Massive Time Savings
benefits.description: Compress up to 20 images at once instead of processing them individually.

benefits.title: Consistent Qualité
benefits.description: Apply the same compression settings to all images for uniform results across your project.

benefits.title: Up to 80% Size Reduction
benefits.description: Reduce image file sizes dramatically without noticeable quality loss using smart compression.

howItWorks.title: Télécharger Plusieurs Images
howItWorks.description: Select or drag up to 20 images. Supports JPEG, PNG, WebP up to 25MB each. Processing stays in your browser.

howItWorks.title: Choose Compression Mode
howItWorks.description: Set a quality level (1-100%) or enter a target file size in KB. Select output format (JPEG, PNG, WebP).

howItWorks.title: Compress All Images
howItWorks.description: Click compress and watch as each image is processed. See real-time progress and compression results.

howItWorks.title: Télécharger Results
howItWorks.description: Download individual images or get all compressed images as a single ZIP file. See total space saved.

faq.question: How many Images can I compress at once?
faq.answer: You can compress up to 20 Images at once. This limit ensures optimal browser performance while providing efficient Lot Traitement.

faq.question: What's the difference between Qualité and target size modes?
faq.answer: Quality mode (1-100%) gives you direct control over compression level. Target size mode automatically finds the best quality to achieve a specific file size in KB. Use target size when you need files under a certain limit.

faq.question: Will Compression reduce Image Qualité?
faq.answer: Compression involves a trade-off between file size and quality. At 70-80% quality, most people cannot see the difference. Target size mode automatically finds the best quality for your size requirement.

faq.question: What's the Meilleur Format for Compression?
faq.answer: WebP offers the best compression (25-35% smaller than JPEG) with excellent quality. JPEG is best for photos and has universal browser support. PNG is lossless but creates larger files.

faq.question: Are my Images uploaded to your servers?
faq.answer: No! All Compression happens directly in your browser using Canvas API technology. Your Images never leave your device, ensuring Complet privacy.

faq.question: How does the target size mode work?
faq.answer: Target size mode uses binary search to automatically find the highest Qualité setting that achieves your target file size. It tests Plusieurs Qualité levels until it finds the optimal balance.

faq.question: Can I mix different Image formats?
faq.answer: Yes! You can upload JPEG, PNG, and WebP images together. They'll all be converted to your chosen output format during compression.

faq.question: Is there a file size limit?
faq.answer: Each image can be up to 25MB. This limit is based on browser memory, not server restrictions (since we don't upload to servers).
